p:
All five studies found that CPT significantly reduces the viral load and increase the level of neutralizing antibody over time. Viral loads also decreased and became negative between day 1 and 30 days after the CPT. Chenguang Shen et al
7 described that IgG titers of the treated patients increased upto 145 800 and the IgM titers also increased upto 145 800 after CPT.
